isosensitivity: ISO 100 - 6400 in steps of 1 EV; can also be set to approx. 1 EV above ISO 6400 (ISO 12800 equivalent); auto ISO sensitivity control available
accessoriesincluded: - EN-EL14 rechargeable Li-ion battery (with terminal cover) - MH-24 battery charger - AN-DC3 strap - EG-CP14 audio/video cable - UC-E17 USB cable - DK-5 eyepiece cap - BS-1 accessory shoe cover - DK-20 rubber eyecup - BF-1B body cap
cleaning: - Image sensor cleaning - Image Dust Off reference data
dimensions: 125 x 96 x 76.5 mm (L x W x D)
